languages.text: "Я не нападу на Вольного Торговца и не возьмусь его судить, но вот напомнить о вам о священном долге перед Империумом обязан — даже если это вызовет ваше неудовольствие".
"I will not attack a Rogue Trader, nor will I judge him, but I am obligated to remind you about your sacred duty to the Imperium — even if I must do so at your displeasure."
languages.original_text: "Я не нападу на Вольного Торговца и не возьмусь его судить, но вот напомнить о вам о священном долге перед Империумом обязан — даже если это вызовет ваше неудовольствие".

traits.locale_text: "I will not attack a Rogue Trader nor will I judge him, but I am obligated to remind you about your sacred duty to the Imperium — even if I must do so at your displeasure."
"I will not attack a Rogue Trader nor will I judge him, but I am obligated to remind you about your sacred duty to the Imperium — even if I must do so at your displeasure."
"I will not attack a Rogue Trader, nor will I judge him, but I am obligated to remind you about your sacred duty to the Imperium — even if I must do so at your displeasure."

"I will not attack a Rogue Trader, nor will I judge him, but I am obligated to remind you about your sacred duty to the Imperium — even if I must do so at your displeasure."
"I will not attack a Rogue Trader, nor will I judge him, but I am obligated to remind you about your sacred duty to the Imperium — even if I must do so at your displeasure."

languages.text: “我绝不会对行商浪人出手，也不会评判他们的所作所为。然而，我有义务提醒你对帝国的神圣职责，哪怕这么做会让你感到恼火。”
languages.original_text: "I will not attack a Rogue Trader, nor will I judge him, but I am obligated to remind you about your sacred duty to the Imperium — even if I must do so at your displeasure."

traits.locale_text: “我绝不会对行商浪人出手，也不会评判他们的所作所为。然而，我有义务提醒你对帝国的神圣职责，哪怕这么做会让你感到恼火。”

languages.text: «No atacaré a un Comerciante Independiente ni lo juzgaré, pero me veo obligado a recordarle su deber hacia el Imperium, por mucho que le desagrade».
languages.original_text: "I will not attack a Rogue Trader, nor will I judge him, but I am obligated to remind you about your sacred duty to the Imperium — even if I must do so at your displeasure."

traits.locale_text: «No atacaré a un Comerciante Independiente ni lo juzgaré, pero me veo obligado a recordarle su deber hacia el Imperium, por mucho que le desagrade».

languages.text: « Je refuse d'attaquer ou de juger un libre-marchand, mais je suis dans l'obligation de vous rappeler votre devoir sacré envers l'Imperium, même si cela vous déplaît. »
languages.original_text: "I will not attack a Rogue Trader, nor will I judge him, but I am obligated to remind you about your sacred duty to the Imperium — even if I must do so at your displeasure."

traits.locale_text: « Je refuse d'attaquer ou de juger un libre-marchand, mais je suis dans l'obligation de vous rappeler votre devoir sacré envers l'Imperium, même si cela vous déplaît. »

languages.text: 「俺は自由開拓者を攻撃するつもりも裁くつもりもない。だけど、たとえお前の不興を買っても、お前に帝国への聖なる義務を思い出させる責任があるんだ」
languages.original_text: "I will not attack a Rogue Trader, nor will I judge him, but I am obligated to remind you about your sacred duty to the Imperium — even if I must do so at your displeasure."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は自由開拓者を攻撃するつもりも裁くつもりもない。だけど、たとえお前の不興を買っても、お前に帝国への聖なる義務を思い出させる責任があるんだ」

languages.text: "Bir Hür Tacir'e saldırmayacağım, onu yargılamayacağım da ancak sana İmparatorluk'a karşı kutsal görevini hatırlatmakla yükümlüyüm. Bundan memnun olmasan bile bu böyle."
languages.original_text: "I will not attack a Rogue Trader, nor will I judge him, but I am obligated to remind you about your sacred duty to the Imperium — even if I must do so at your displeasure."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Hür Tacir'e saldırmayacağım, onu yargılamayacağım da ancak sana İmparatorluk'a karşı kutsal görevini hatırlatmakla yükümlüyüm. Bundan memnun olmasan bile."

languages.text: "Ich werde keinen Freihändler angreifen und auch nicht über ihn richten, aber ich muss Euch an Eure heilige Pflicht gegenüber dem Imperium erinnern – auch wenn Euch das nicht gefällt."
languages.original_text: "I will not attack a Rogue Trader, nor will I judge him, but I am obligated to remind you about your sacred duty to the Imperium — even if I must do so at your displeasure."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde keinen Freihändler angreifen und auch nicht über ihn richten, aber ich muss Euch an Eure heilige Pflicht gegenüber dem Imperium erinnern – auch wenn Euch das nicht gefällt."
